name: codeigniter-npm-build
description: An npm build tool designed for Codeigniter
author: Sam Templeman <templeman@me.com>

scripts.uglify: echo '=> minify:js' && mkdir -p public/assets/js && uglifyjs node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js src/js/main.js -b -o public/assets/js/app.js && uglifyjs src/js/undead-languages.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/undead-languages.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/corporate-directory.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/corporate-directory.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/connecting-dots.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/connecting-dots.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/orphans.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/orphans.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/immortal-bed.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/immortal-bed.min.js && uglifyjs src/js/blind-hunters.js -m -c -o public/assets/js/blind-hunters.min.js
scripts.imagemin: echo '=> minify:images' && mkdir -p public/assets/images && cp -a src/images/* public/assets/images
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run data
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run watch:all
